Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Footnote \Foot"note`\, n. A note of reference or comment at the foot[4] of a page. [1913 Webster]

footnote n : a printed note placed below the text on a printed page [syn: {footer}] v : add explanatory notes to or supply with critical comments; "The scholar annotated the early edition of a famous novel" [syn: {annotate}]
